items.name: Tavuk Izgara
items.description: Izgara tavuk, patates püresi, haşlanmış sebzeler ve yoğurt (grilled chicken breast, mashed potatoe, boiled mixed veg and natural greek yogurt)

items.name: Köfte Izgara
items.description: El yapımı köfte, kıtır esmer ekmek, ızgara domates, ızgara biber, harissa sos ve karışık patates ve demi glass sos(handmade beef meatballs, crispy brown bread, grilled tomato, grilled pepper, served with a harissa dip and seasamed fries)

items.name: Somon Izgara
items.description: Taze ıspanak sotesi, yeşil mercimek yahni, salsa verde ve baharatlı fırınlanmış patates (grilled salmon served on a bed of green lentils, Sautéed spinach, salsa verde and balced seasoned potatoes)

items.name: Steak Fajita
items.description: TAntrikot parçaları, renkli biberler, sotelenmiş soğan, çedar peyniri (sliced antrikot steak, mixed peppers, sauteed onions and cheddar cheese served on a sizzling skillet)

items.name: Antrikot Steak
items.description: ızgara et, (fırın patates veya püre), haşlanmış sebzeler ve seçtiğiniz sos (mantar sos veya demi glass sos) ile birlikte (grilled steak served with a choice of mash potato or roasted potatoes, boiled veg and a sauce of your choke (mushroom sauce of demiglaze))

items.name: Chicken Fajita
items.description: tavuk parçaları, renkli biberler, sotelenmiş soğan, çedar peyiri (grilled chicken, mixed peppers, sauteed onions and cheddar cheese served on a sizzling skillet)

items.name: Combo Fajita
items.description: Tavuk ve antrikot parçaları, renkli biberler, sotelenmiş soğan, çedar peyniri(A combo mix of sliced antricot steak and grilled chicken, mixed peppers, sauteed onions and cheddar cheese served on a sizzling skillet)

items.name: Hamburger
items.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.

items.name: Cheese Burger
items.description: Toasted sourdough with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a poached egg.

items.name: 1938 Double Burger
items.description: Three-egg omelette with your choice of fillings: cheese, ham, mushrooms, spinach.

items.name: Karışık Tost
items.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.

items.name: Kaşar ve Domatesli Tost
items.description: Toasted sourdough with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a poached egg.

items.name: Tavuk Sandviç
items.description: Three-egg omelette with your choice of fillings: cheese, ham, mushrooms, spinach.

items.name: Penne Pomodoro/Arabiata
items.description: İtalyan domates soslu penne (Penne with Italian tomato sauce)

items.name: Spaghetti Bolognaise
items.description: Bolenez soslu Spagetti (Spaghetti with Bolognese sauce)

items.name: Fettuccine Al Fredo
items.description: Tavuk, mantar, beyaz şarap ve hafif krema soslu Papardelle (Papardelle with chicken, mushrooms, white wine and light cream sauce)

items.name: Sebzeli Noodle
items.description: renkli biber, mantar, soğan, oyster sos, susam yağı ve soya filizi (mixed peppers, mushrooms, onions, oyster sauce, sesame oil, soy sauce and beansprouts)

items.name: Tavuklu Noodles
items.description: Tavuk göğüs parçaları, renkli biberler, mantar, soğan, oyster sos, susam yağı, soya sosu ve soya filizi (Sliced grilled chicken, mixed peppers, mushrooms, onions, oyster sauce, sesame oil, soy sauce and beansprouts)

items.name: Et Noodles
items.description: Dana bonfile parçaları, renkli biberler, mantar, soğan, oyster sos, susam yağı, soya sosu ve soya filizi (Sliced beef, mixed peppers, mushrooms, onions, oyster sauce, sesame oil, soy sauce and beansprouts)

items.name: Tavuk Wrap
items.description: (Tavuk parçaları, renkli biberler, soğan, marul, kaşar peyniri, kaşık patatesler ve naneli yoğurt) (Sliced chicken, mixed peppers, onions, mushrooms, cheddar cheese with a side of mint yogurt)

items.name: Vegeteryan Wrap
items.description: renkli biberler, kabak, mantar, soğan, domates, marul, range ve domates sosu eşliğinde (mixed peppers, onions, mushrooms, cheddar cheese with a side of range and tangy tomato sauce)

items.name: Vegetarian Tacos
items.description: Tortilla taco, karışık fırınlanmış sebzeler, mısır, jalapeno, meksika fasulyesi, çedar peyniri (Tortilla taco, mixed oven cooked vegetables, sweetcorn, jalapenos, red kidney beans and cheddar cheese)

items.name: Chicken Tacos
items.description: sandviç ekmeği, sezar sos, roka, dilim domatesler ve ızgara tavuk (traditional sandwich bread, ceaser sauce, rocket, sliced tomatoes and grilled chicken)

items.name: Steak Tacos
items.description: Konfit pişmiş dana eti, jalapeno, meksika fasulyesi, çedar peynirli (Tortilla taco, sliced steak, sweetcorn, jalapenos, red kidney beans and cheddar cheese)

items.name: Margarita
items.description: domates, dört peynir karışımı ve fesleğen (tomatos, four cheese blend and thyme)

items.name: Pepperoni
items.description: double Pepperoni, ve double mozarella peyniri (double Peperonni and double Mozarella cheese)

items.name: 1938 Pizza
items.description: salam, mantar, sucuk, mısır, zeytin, sosis, yeşil biber ve Mozarella peyniri (salami, mashroom, turkish pepperoni, olives, sausage, green peppers and Mozarella cheese)

items.name: Vegeterian
items.description: karışık sebzeler ve Mozarella peyniri (mixed veges and Mozarella cheese)

items.name: Kendi omletini kendin yap
items.description: iki adet göz yumurta / two eggs sunny side up İlaveler / Extras - ( peynir/cheese , sucuk/turkish pepperoni, domates/tomatoes, mantar/mushrooms, biber/peppers)

items.name: Kendi omletini kendin yarat
items.description: İlaveler / Extras - ( peynir/cheese , sucuk/turkish pepperoni, domates/tomatoes, mantar/mushrooms, biber/peppers, soğan/onions, acı biber/chilli peppers)

items.name: Karışık Omlette
items.description: (2 yumurtalı omlett, renkli biberler, kaşar peyniri, domates, mantar, salami) (2 eggs omlette, mixed peppers, kashar cheese, tomatoes, mushrooms,salami)

items.name: Menemen (acılı/acısız)
items.description: İlaveler / Extras - ( peynir/cheese , sucuk/turkish pepperoni)

items.name: Fit sporcu omleti
items.description: (4 yumurta beyazı, 1  yumurta sarısı, nor peyniri, limon soslu roka, keten tohumu,domates) (4 eggs whites, 1 egg yolk, cyprot nor cheese, rocket, lemon juice,Konkas ,tomatoes)

items.name: Kahvaltı tabağı
items.description: (Salatalık, domates, zeytin, peynir çeşitleri, bal, tereyağı, reçel,ızgara hellim, 2 sigara böreği, 1 yumurta (haşlanmış, kızarmış,çırpılmış) ve ekmek sepeti) (Cucmber, tomato, olives, a mix of cheese, honey, butter, jam, grilled halloumi, 2 cigerette rolls, 1 egg of choice(boiled, fried or scrambled) and a bread basket)

items.name: Granola kase
items.description: (Granola, soya sütü, karışık mini dağ meyveleri, hindistan cevizi, çilek, tarçın ve yeşil elma) (Grano, soy milk, mixed black forest fruits, coconut, strawberry, cinnamon and apple)
